channel.title: How to edit shops in a 508
channel.description:
i am using a [508] source and i am trying to figure out how to edit the shops.
Someone plz help.

item.title: How to edit shops in a 508
item.dc:creator: @brust brust
item.description:
@brust wrote:

If you are using an old bulby, you will find the items and prices in Player.java. The code will look something like: [code=Java]int[] shop1 = {shop items here}; int[] shop1N = {shop item amounts here}; int[] shop1P = {shop item prices here};[/code]

Thank you very much for that information, I had the same problem.

HOWEVER, I have a new problem now .
I edit shops (change item ID’s, or just change an item price),then I compile but the shops stay the same

Do you know how to fix this?

Ps: Compiler works (tried with other updates)
I’m edditing existing shops, which have underpriced stuff

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit shops in a 508

item.source: How to edit shops in a 508

item.title: How to edit shops in a 508
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“hippo429, post:4, topic:337445”]there must be an shops.cfg if not its probably just shopss… and for the prices it is in the items.cfg or just items. it will be the first three numbers after the name 1st is price 2nd is low alch price and 3rd is high alch price.[/quote]He said 508, not 317. 508’s do not use shops.cfg.

As to the problem, it depends what source you are using. If you are using an old bulby, you will find the items and prices in Player.java. The code will look something like:int[] shop1 = {shop items here}; int[] shop1N = {shop item amounts here}; int[] shop1P = {shop item prices here};

Later sources have a call file that have the same format called Shops.java, usually in the util/shop folder.

My source has them in ShopHandler.java and Engine.java.

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit shops in a 508

item.title: How to edit shops in a 508
item.dc:creator: @hippo429 hippo429
item.description:
@hippo429 wrote:

there must be an shops.cfg if not its probably just shopss… and for the prices it is in the items.cfg or just items. it will be the first three numbers after the name 1st is price 2nd is low alch price and 3rd is high alch price.

Read full topic

item.title: How to edit shops in a 508
item.dc:creator: @hippo429 hippo429
item.description:
@hippo429 wrote:

a little more details would be helpfull. if you want to change what is inside the shop (like for sale) then go to to shops.cfg and its pretty much self explainatory. lol

EXAMPLE: shop = 38 general_store 2 2 #### &&&&

= the ID to what you want to sell

&&&& = the amount of that item that is available

hope this helps

Read full topic
